Class parentalControls

java.lang.Object
classes.parentalControls
public class parentalControls extends Object
A class representing the parental control menu.

parentalControls allows a 'parent' actor to change the earliest and latest in the day that a user can begin a game session. It contains the password set by the 'parent' actor, methods for saving/reading the time_log, and displaying the player statistics (time played and average session time).

Version:
1.0
Author:
Everett Guyea

  • Constructor Details

    • parentalControls

      public parentalControls(LocalTime allowedStart, LocalTime allowedEnd, boolean isRestrictionEnabled)
      Constructor for the parentalControls class.
      Parameters:
      allowedStart - A LocalTime object containing the earliest time a player is allowed to start a game session.
      allowedEnd - A LocalTime object containing the latest time a player is allowed to start a game session.
      isRestrictionEnabled - A boolean value that is true if the time restriction feature is enabled and false otherwise.

  • Method Details

    • setTimeRestriction

      public void setTimeRestriction(LocalTime start, LocalTime end)
      A method to set the time restriction parameters to dictate when a player is allowed to start a game session.
      Parameters:
      start - A Time object containing the time that is the earliest in the day a user can start a game session.
      end - A Time object containing the time that is the latest in the day a user can start a game session.

    • toggleTimeRestriction

      public void toggleTimeRestriction(boolean toggle)
      A method toggle the time restriction feature.
      Parameters:
      toggle - A boolean value dictating if the time restriction feature should be enabled(true) or not(false).

    • isPlayAllowed

      public boolean isPlayAllowed()
      A method to check if the game can be played based on the allowedStart and allowedEnd times.
      Returns:
      A boolean value that is true if the current time is between the allowed play times set by the 'parent' actor

    • displayStatistics

      public String[] displayStatistics()
      A method to retrieve the players total time and average time across game sessions.
      Returns:
      An integer array where the first value is the total time and the second is average time.

    • revivePet

      public void revivePet(int slot)
      A method to revive a deceased pet in a specified save slot.
      Parameters:
      slot - An integer containing the specified save slot (1 - 3)

    • getPassword

      public String getPassword()
      A getter for the password variable.
      Returns:
      A String containing the password set by the 'parent' actor.

    • setPassword

      public void setPassword(String password)
      A setter for the password variable.
      Parameters:
      password - A String containing the password set by the 'parent' actor.

    • getAllowedStart

      public LocalTime getAllowedStart()
      A getter for the allowedStart variable.
      Returns:
      A LocalTime object containing the earliest time in the day a user is allowed to play the game at.

    • getAllowedEnd

      public LocalTime getAllowedEnd()
      A getter for the allowedEnd variable.
      Returns:
      A LocalTime object containing the latest time in the day a user is allowed to play until.

    • isRestrictionEnabled

      public boolean isRestrictionEnabled()

    • resetTimeLog

      public void resetTimeLog()
      Method to reset the time_log.json file

    • logStartTime

      public void logStartTime()
      A method to log the current time of a game session.

    • logEndTime

      public void logEndTime()
      A method to log the end time of a game session.
